Posts.Content: there are so many avenues to choose from it's almost as paralyzing as being diagnosed. but one which i found most enlightening was cannabis oil, (check out phoenixtears.ca or rick simplsons run from the cure). what i liked most about it was that he told you to grow it yourself to ensure its efficacy. which depending on the type of person you are and where you live can be difficult.  i wish i could give personal testament to this, however at this point it's only a recommendation. i know someday i shall produce my own to try. meantime, check out the reviews. thank you for your blog...
Posts.Title: Are there any stage IV breast cancer survivors thru alternative treatments????
